3. Apply seasonal patterns

## Divine Command Reference

### Quick Access Rituals
```bash
npm run dev:full              # Start agricultural development
npm run guide:context         # Set agricultural context
npm run guide:error          # Error handling assistance
npm run guide:security       # Security implementation
```

### Sacred Keyboard Bindings
- `Ctrl+Shift+A`: Agricultural context panel
- `Ctrl+Shift+G`: Guide selection menu
- `Ctrl+Shift+E`: Error analysis toolkit
- `Ctrl+Shift+D`: Deployment panel

### Divine Slash Commands
```bash
/agricultural-setup          # Project initialization
/seasonal-feature           # Season-aware feature
/farmer-workflow            # Farmer functionality
/analyze-agricultural-error # Domain-specific analysis
/security-audit            # Agricultural security
/release-planning          # Seasonal release strategy
```
